name: libris-vault-backend
description: Node.js backend powers a localized bookstore management system for Pakistan, supporting three user roles: Super Admin, Seller, and User. It handles user authentication, book inventory management, order processing, payments integration (JazzCash/Easypaisa), and analytics. The backend provides RESTful APIs for managing books, sellers, orders, promotions, and reviews, while supporting features like bulk book uploads, ISBN-based metadata retrieval, and multilingual (Urdu/English) data handling. Scalable and modular, it ensures secure data management, efficient performance, and seamless interaction with frontend applications.
author: zain100000
